panels.description: The number of calls into the selected transactions within the selected timeframe.

panels.description: The average response time of the selected transactions.
panels.title: Avg Response Time (ms)

panels.description: The number of selected transactions whose avg time has increased by more than the critical slowdown threshold (as defined in the Settings dashboard) compared to the baseline period.
panels.title: P1 Slow Transactions

panels.description: The number of selected transactions whose avg time has increased by more than the slowdown threshold (as defined in the Settings dashboard) compared to the baseline period.
panels.title: P2 Slow Transactions

panels.description: The rate of $transactionFailureTypes and the number of calls into the selected transactions. Transaction failure types are defined in the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: Failure %

panels.description: The number of $transactionFailureTypes that occured in the selected transactions. Failure types are defined in the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: Failures

panels.description: The response time of the selected transactions overlaid on the number of calls (throughput) into them.
panels.title: Response Time ($transactionAvg)

panels.description: All transaction failure types: $transactionFailureText. Click on a transaction's failure rate below to drill down into its errors. The error types defined as failures are defined in the Settings dashboard.
